rule.reminder: {1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.

rulelist.rule: Unearth {1}{R}
Destroy target artifact or land.

rule.reminder: {2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.

rulelist.rule: Cycling {2}
Flying

rule.reminder: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulelist.rule: Exalted
Flying
When Welkin Guide enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Where Ancients Tread deal 5 damage to target creature or player.
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.

rule.reminder: Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.

rulelist.rule: Lifelink
Windwright Mage has flying as long as an artifact card is in your graveyard.

rule.reminder: {2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.

rulelist.rule: Cycling {2}
